name: Bloon Huntr
description:
2-player game where one player dodges projectiles shot by the second played. Made during UL game jam 23/03/2019.

CONTROLS
Balloon player - arrow keys to move
Shooter player - WASD to move, spacebar to shoot, 1-3 to switch sides

Art Assets

Flute + dart -> made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com 
Coconut, vines, background etc. -> Freepik
Characters -kenney

Music

MOSAIC by Lahar https://soundcloud.com/musicbylahar
